name: Animal Sounds for Children
description:
• Very easy to use, your little child will learn by himself, no need for and adult! just choose the animal you like and tap on it, or wait a few seconds, Kids will giggle on pet sound and reaction!
  • Enless entertain, fun and education at home with parents, playroom with nanny or preschool with nurse!
  • Designed for babies 6 months and up, toddlers, preschool and kindergarten children, boys and girls.
  • Always proper, decent and respectful content for kids, no personal information asked, ad-free (really, no ads at all).
  • Adorable cartoon graphics and music.
